titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse at 300 North Hogan Street, Jacksonville, Florida, as the "Judge Bryan Simpson United States Courthouse".
To designate the United States courthouse at 300 North Hogan Street, Jacksonville, Florida, as the "Judge Bryan Simpson United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Designates the U.S. courthouse at 300 North Hogan Street, Jacksonville, Florida, as the Judge Bryan Simpson United States Courthouse.
